release.description: Upgrade to Eclipse 4.6.2 and Ant 1.10.0; remove dot fallback for GTK in PrintAction
release.action: Remove dot fallback for GTK from PrintAction.
Download JzGraph from GitHub.
Use Grand core 1.9.4.
Upgrade to Ant 1.10.0.
Upgrade to Eclipse 4.6.2.

release.description: Use project properties to configure graph rendering; upgrade to Ant 1.9.8
release.action: Upgrade to Ant 1.9.8.
Use project properties to configure graph rendering (outputconfigprefix).
Generate site with Maven and publish to GitHub Pages.

release.description: Repackaged GUI 0.8.1 release because of incorrect file permissions in distribution
release.action: Correct file execute permissions in distribution archives.
Use Grand core 1.9.3.

release.description: Repackaged 1.9.2 release because of out-of-sync pom.xml; added pom.xml property checks for Ant builds; fixed test-bed tests
release.action: Update pom.xml.
Add pom.xml property checks in build.xml.
Fix test-bed tests (wrong clean target).

release.description: Upgrade to Eclipse 4.6.1; macOS-friendly menus and accelerators; an updated equivalent of 0.7.2
release.action: Upgrade to Eclipse 4.6.1.
Launch GrandUI directly (java -jar) on Windows and Linux.
Remove JNLP and related launchers.
Build application bundle for macOS.
Use SpinnerField for preferences.
Macify menus and accelerators.

release.description: Upgrade to Eclipse 4.6 and Grand core 1.9.2; new action for prefixed node filter
release.action: Add an action for prefixed node filter.
Download Grand core from GitHub.
Use Grand core 1.9.2.
Use Java 6.
Upgrade to Eclipse 4.6.
Run on Mac OS X natively using Cocoa support in SWT, no need for JNLP.
Upgrade to Eclipse 4.3.
Use Java 1.5.0.
Implement a launcher to solve JNLP classpath problems.
Ticket #101: make Application public.
Ticket #103: create a launcher based on Ant to set the correct classpath.
Upgrade to Eclipse 3.1.
Upgrade to Ant 1.6.5.
Add Mac OS X support to JNLP.
Change platform information logging level from debug to info.
Add Ant version information to Application (logging) and AboutDialog.

release.description: Support additions to subant task in Ant 1.7+; re-enable Maven builds; upgrade to Ant 1.9.7
release.action: Upgrade to Ant 1.9.7.
Handle target and buildpath in subant (Java 1.7+ API).
Convert old Maven 1 configuration to pom.xml.

release.description: Correct default color names; upgrade to Ant 1.9.6
release.action: Upgrade to Ant 1.9.6.
Upgrade to Java 6.
Use Ivy dependency management.
Change default graph properties, use limegreen instead of lime (defined only in svg but not x11 namespace).

release.description: Upgrade to Ant 1.9.2 and JUnit 4; new filter type: prefixed
release.action: Use Junit 4.
Implement prefixed node filter.
Change default graph properties, use lime instead of cyan for nodes with description.
Upgrade to Ant 1.9.2.
Use Java 1.5.0.
Make it possible to add property files to AntTaskNode.
More dependency generating tasks from ant-contrib (antcallback, antfetch, switch, try/catch).
Bad cut-and-paste in postInit().
Upgrade to Ant 1.6.5.
Add Ant version information to Configuration.

release.description: Fix problem with missing libraries in builds
release.action: Fix the problem with missing SWT shared libraries in builds.
Upgrade to Ant 1.6.3.

release.description: Fix compilation with javac 1.4 on Windows
release.action: Fix compilation with javac 1.4 on Windows.
Upgrade to Eclipse RCP 3.1.0.
Use setAccelerator in constructor rather than overriding getAccelerator.

release.description: Export graph as image; sort properties in editor; sort outline panel; autorefresh in log viewer
release.action: Use Grand core 1.8.
Ticket #90: Add an autorefresh toggle for LogViewer.
Ticket #93: add a small "T" on the trace icon.
Implement sorting of outline panel.
Ticket #100: implement export of graph as an image.
Ticket #97: add a specific event to refresh the complete property list instead of sending an add event for each property on set input.
Ticket #99: sort property editor columns

release.description: Support for target element in ant and antcall; distinguish between targets with the same name in different files
release.action: Ticket #94: duplicate AntProjectTest to perform the same tests using the File constructor.
Ticket #28: add a numeric suffix for targets with the same name in different build files.
Ticket #102: add support for the target element in ant and antcall tasks.
Upgrade to Ant 1.6.3.

release.description: Log window; support for mouse wheel; Open File action complemented with property editor dialog
release.action: Use Grand core 1.7.
Upgrade to Eclipse RCP 3.1M5a.
Ticket #75: implement property editor dialog to complement Open File action.
Ticket #75: Implement property storage in XML.
Ticket #75: use a plain PreferenceStore rather than the JDK preference API.
Upgrade to Draw2d 3.1.0M3.
Ticket #91: display trace and debug messages in LogViewer.
Ticket #84: add a tooltip mechanism to LogViewer.
Ticket #89: add an event detail dialog.
Ticket #86: rewrite default LogViewer layout.
Ticket #88: make addFilter and clearFilter methods run asynchronously.
Ticket #80: add progressMonitor.done() at the end of addFilter and clearFilter.
Ticket #81: add a flag to prevent the centering of the graph on the selected node when the selection comes from the graph itself.
Add images for debug and trace log levels.
Ticket #85: implement a simple class to load and display a saved log.
Ticket #82: add images for log levels: info, warning, error, fatal.
Ticket #76: Create a log window.
Add a filter to remove a set of nodes from view.
Ticket #79: add a test for taskdef.
Ticket #72: improved sync between outline and other panels.
Use Grand core 1.6.
Add zoom actions on mouse wheel.
Add Java version information to AboutDialog.
Use new core logging API.
Use common logging in Grand's core.

release.description: New filter type: removenode; improved handling of taskdef outside of a target
release.action: Ticket #75: add AntProject constructor with a set of properties.
Ticket #79: hook a helper on taskdef to ignore the class loading problem (alternate solution using AntXMLContext breaks import task).
Ticket #92: implement NodeRemoverFilter.
Ticket #16/28: support for subgraphs.

release.description: Logging API; specific style for subant generic ant file links; DOT generator uses visitor API
release.action: Ticket #68: implement a specific style for subant generic ant file links.
Keep DOT files for failed tests.
Start nodes lack the comment set.
Ticket #36: rewrite DotWriter to use the new visitor API.
Ticket #73: remove references to the old logging API.
Ticket #35: implement new logging API.
Ticket #4: add the ability to use common logging with UI.

release.description: Outline panel; maskable outline and source code panels; line style preferences for subant generic ant file links
release.action: Ticket #56: add decorator to the outline view.
Ticket #71: fix scrolling to target with a zoom other than 1:1.
Implement preliminary support for outline window.
Move Zoom feature to a Menu/Action system.
When opening a graph by double-clicking on a link node, focus on the linked target.
Ticket #70: add Show Source Panel toggle to the View menu.
Create View menu.
Fix the order of the recent files.
Ticket #69: add line style preferences for subant generic ant file links.
Upgrade dependencies to Eclipse 3.0.1.
Ticket #66: add swt-lib.jar to the deploy target.
Create a JNLP launcher.

release.description: Support for subant task; improved handling of ant task; use Ant 1.6.2 API for target execution conditions
release.action: Ticket #58: support for subant task.
Ticket #67: use getAbsolutePath() to make tests independent of OS.
Automatically increment build numbers when releasing.
Ticket #65: correct tooltip for unless attribute.
Upgrade to Ant 1.6.2.
Ticket #53: add build info to Configuration.
Ticket #59: correctly process ant task with no target specified.
Implement TargetConditionHelper using the new Ant 1.6.2 API.
Add a draft API to attach the source code to every node.
When processing an ant task with the dir attribute set, prepend attribute value with the project base dir if it is not an absolute path.

release.description: Preferences dialog; recent files menu; target source code panel
release.action: Ticket #63: removed NPE on dead graphs when changing preferences.
Upgrade to Ant 1.6.2.
Ticket #62: add core build info to the About dialog.
Ticket #13: add preference dialog.
Add IPreferenceStore based entirely on JDK 1.4 prefs API.
Put the Grand icon on all windows used in the application.
Ticket #19: add Recent Files to File menu.
Ticket #53: node listener makes the graph leave the drag mode on mouseReleased event.
Upgrade to GEF 3.0.
Ticket #55: do not spawn a thread when toggling bus routing.
Ticket #54: use an empty string to represent a node with no source.
Ticket #38: add a target source code panel.

release.description: Repackaged 0.3 release because of corrupted jar files
Zoom; doubleclick to open files; page setup dialog
release.action: Ticket #39: add zoom feature.
Upgrade to Eclipse RCP 3.0 and GEF 20040619.
Ticket #47: openfile and reload graph must be synchronous.
Change event processing: the canvas will no longer go in scroll mode when button 1 is clicked on a node.
Bug: if a mouse up event is missed, then the graph always stays in drag mode.
Add Page Setup dialog.
Ticket #50: update About image.
Ticket #22: add Help menu with an About dialog.
A double click on a external node opens the build file.
Add Ant build file name as a tab tooltip.
Ticket #9: compute the actual bounding box since getBounds() return values are incorrect.
Ticket #49: GraphControler must not send events if the selection hasn't changed.
Add cursor changes.
Add splash screen.
Refactor EventManager and Dispatcher.
Refactor Main and AppData into Application.

release.description: Bus routing; multiple graphs in tabs; improved tooltips
release.action: Ticket #45: implement toggle for bus routing.
Ticket #44: add alternative font properties for Windows.
Ticket #43: add tooltip on bus links.
Ticket #46: output "Link #n" rather than "Link #: n" in the tooltip.
Add bus routing.
Update icons.
Ticket #40: add the link order in the tooltip.
Ticket #21: add a listener mechanism for the availability of the graph controllers.
Upgrade to Eclipse RCP 3.0RC2 and Draw2d 20040610.
Ticket #27: open multiple graphs.
Upgrade to Grand 1.4.
Ticket #32: do not clear the filter chain when reloading the graph.
Rewrite GraphController using visitor API.
Implement font and image registries, improve tooltips.

release.description: Fixes for GUI release 0.2
release.action: Ticket #41: replace properties in ant/antcall parameters and build file names.

release.description: Full support for dependencies created by tasks
release.action: Ticket #34: handle runtarget task.
Ticket #29: correctly display nested ant, antcall and similar tasks.
Add AntTaskLink and LinkFinderVisitor for dependencies created by tasks.
Add visitor API to links and nodes.
AntProject must find out whether ant task calls an internal or an external target.
Add conditional attribute on links and nodes.

release.description: Initial release
release.action: Ticket #30: add graph name in doPrint.
Ticket #26: FilterChainModel removes the filters prior to graph loading.
Ticket #1: add ConnectionAnchor type.
Ticket #18: add print action with a dot fallback for GTK.
Manage filtering and graph reload.
Create EventManager and DispatcherFactory.
Ticket #15: implement color change for weak links.
Ticket #7: add selection events.
Add more attributes on nodes, labels on links.
Ticket #2: mark note nature with different shapes and colors.
Use JzGraph.

release.description: More information on targets
release.action: Ticket #24: add GraphElementFactory interface and specialized classes for Ant graph.
ReflectConditionHelper must send null when no if/unless conditions are defined.

release.description: Filter chains; preliminary support for ant task
release.action: Compile against Ant 1.6.1.
Implement preliminary support for ant task.
Fix jikes warning.
Ticket #12: add FilterChain class; remove getFilteredNodes from GraphFilter interface.
Ticket #11: getGraph returns null before the producer is set.

release.description: Official release: code cleanup
release.action: Fix jikes warnings.

release.description: Official beta: code cleanup
release.action: Run Checkstyle inspection and adjust coding style.
Remove obsolete net.ggtools.grand.App class.

release.description: Property setting in GrandTask; improved handling of missing targets; support for foreach task
release.action: Rename propertyfile task attribute to outputconfigfile.
Handle foreach task.
Create missing targets to satisfy dependencies, implement MissingNodeFilter to remove generated nodes from graph.
Add a property setting mechanism in GrandTask.

release.description: Display graph name
release.action: Implement showgraphname task attribute.
Update build.xml in test-bed.
Adjust assertions about log contents to prevent failures due to different path separator on Windows.
Make handling of antcall task more robust: do not crash when a target is defined by property or when getTaskType returns null.

release.description: Filters; weak links to support antcall task
release.action: Implement weak links to support antcall task.
Implement ConnectedFilter.
Implement ToNodeFilter.
Create GraphWalkFilter.
Implement FromNodeFilter.
Implement IsolatedNodeFilter.

release.description: Internal refactoring to prepare for filtering; use antlib.xml for task and type declaration
release.action: Replace the previous proxification of Ant target with independent objects (Graph).
Introduce the GraphProducer, GraphConsumers and GraphFilters to add versatility to the process.
Add a stupid log class.
Use antlib.xml for task (and type) declaration.

release.description: Fix Maven compilation problem
release.action: Fix Maven compilation problem.

release.description: Initial release
